DOC.brief_summary: Registration of patients after gastrointestinal cancer radical surgery, including the information of treatments, recurrence & metastasis, adverse events,etc.
DOC.brief_title: Registry of Huaier Granule for Prevention of Recurrence and Metastasis of Gastrointestinal Cancer After Radical Surgery
DOC.criteria: 1. Patients with gastrointestinal cancer (stomach, colon or rectum); 2. Patients who have received gastrointestinal cancer radical surgery within a month; 3. Patients between 18 and 70 years old,no gender restriction; 4. Patients volunteer to participate this study and have signed the informed consent form. 1.
